CustomField.inlineHelpText: Transaction Types that will auto apply manual credits from the parent opportunity. Use any combination of "Pledge Payment" , "Recurring Gift Payment", "Matching Gift Payment", "Auto Renewing Membership Payment", "Installment Based Membership Payment", "Auto Renewing POS Payment", "Installment Based POS Payment", ""Partial Payment POS Payment" delimited by ";".
CustomField.label: Auto Apply Opp Hard/Soft Credits
